info.description: Quorum Key Manager API server documentation.
info.title: Quorum Key Manager API

get.description: List of addresses of stored Ethereum Accounts

post.description: Creates a new ECDSA Secp256k1 key representing an Ethereum Account
Import an ECDSA Secp256k1 key representing an Ethereum account
Verify signature of an Ethereum signature
Verify signature of an ethereum type data signing

get.description: Fetch Ethereum Account data by its address

delete.description: Soft delete Ethereum Account, can be recovered
Hard delete Ethereum Account, cannot be recovered

post.description: Sign random hexadecimal payload using selected Ethereum Account
Sign EEA transaction using selected Ethereum Account
Sign Quorum private transaction using selected Ethereum Account
Sign Ethereum transaction using selected Ethereum Account
Sign Typed Data, following the EIP-712 Standard, using selected Ethereum Account

get.description: List identifiers of keys store on selected Store

post.description: Create Key with a specific Curve and Signing algorithm
Import Key with a specific Curve and Signing algorithm
Verify if signature data was signed by a specific key
Sign random payload using a selected key

get.description: List of Secret IDs stored in the selected Store

post.description: Create new Secret on selected Store

scopes.admin: Grants read and write access to administrative information
